subject: Fwd: Simsonn Racing Simulator Pressure Handbrake
description_text:
Hello, I purchased this and cannot get my Windows 11 PC to recognize it.

I get this error about unknown usb device, please see attached image.

There is a white led on when plugged into to usb port on my pc.

Can you please assist me? 

Thank you,

Lee

Sent from my iPhone
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Lee Hua, Please try connecting the device to a rear USB 3.0 (blue) port on your computer, or use a USB hub with its own external power supply.

Thank you!

Rear usb 3.0 blue port fixed the issue. I had it in a usb 2.0 black port and tried 2 other usb 2.0 ports which didn’t work.

Sent from my iPhone

>
